title: Their Saint
description:
Her past shaped her, but three rough and ready bikers will completely transform her future. 
Amaryllis wasn't born into the MC life, but she was raised a Princess of the Hell's Rebels, just like her momma. She was born to be its Queen, until one day, an enemy came and ripped her world apart.Ever since, she's been scrambling for normalcy, and her only haven are three boys... Three boys who protect her, who defend her, who love her. 
Without them, she's vulnerable. 

With them, she's unstoppable. 

But now she's all 'growed' up, it's time for her to become more than THEIR FRIEND. More than THEIR SAINT.It's time she became THEIR WOMAN.But biker brothers don't like sharing their toys, and Ama has a fight on her hands. Will she win? Or will their arrogant obstinacy destroy any chance they have at a happy future? Find out in this, BOOK TWO, the final in the complete Hell's Rebels' MC series. 
This book may contain scenes of a disturbing nature to sensitive readers.
author: Serena Akeroyd
